title: [Large-scale] Planetary Health Leadership: Blended Learning for a Sustainable Future

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic environmental science and organizational management
context.additional_context: Strengthening planetary health competencies for corporate managers/leaders with region-specific relevance and practical applicability

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three core concepts of planetary health and sustainable development
Learners can design two organization-level actionable planetary health strategies
Learners can develop and present one regionally suitable solution through project-based assessment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
